name: Placemaking Week Redesign
shortDescription: For the Information Architecture & Interaction Design class we took on the role of redesigning an existing site for a local company (Project for Public Spaces).  This semester long project went through the initial informatiomn collection to the final production of a digital prototype.
longDescription: We were in a group of five members who broke up the work and worked together to design a new site for 'Placemaking Week', a conference held by the Project for Public Spaces.  Our group worked together to collect user research and then take that research to create a final prototype for the new redesigned website.  We designed paper prototypes for mobile and desktop for a few use cases and finally created a style guide and delivered a final fully designed prototype.
